snippet.title: Is the TV theme tune a lost art?
snippet.description:
30 July 2010
Theme tune composer Simon May and Stephen Price, former BBC scheduler, debate whether the art is dead.

snippet.title: What makes a great TV theme tune?
snippet.description:
Magazine / 8 February 2010
Patrick Hodson, Matfield, Kent, UK Poddington peas was a classic! Dom, Manchester Syd Dale. Theme Music for Screen Test. The marching drum beat.
